tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_data (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    preferences JSON
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  user_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  rating INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, product_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    age INT,
    gender CHAR(1),
    location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    interaction_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Preferences (
    user_id UUID,
    preference_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    preference_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    preference_value VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Recommendations (
    recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    recommendation_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    recommendation_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    preference_name VARCHAR(255),
    preference_value VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(255),
    interaction_data VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE recommended_products (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    recommendation_score FLOAT
)
